short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read or listen to the Holy Quran

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy access to the Quran(القرآن). Read or listen to your favorite reciter at anytime. Your surah, reciter and verse position are all saved automatically for later usage.
The verses audio plays upon clicking on their number and each word of the verse are read upon clicking on them.

new update..
Transliteration added. Click on the translation of the verses to switch between translation and transliteration.

Please, let us know your feedbacks on how things are going for you and what can we do to improve.
